name: Facebook Recent Posts
description: A stream of your 25 most recent Facebook posts. Originates from the Gallery.

facebook.name: Facebook Posts
facebook.description: See information on your 25 most recent Facebook posts including comments, likes, links, privacy settings, etc. Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.label: Facebook Page Name
datasourceConfigModel.description: To find your page name, navigate to your company Facebook page. The page name can be found in the address bar between 'facebook.com/' and the question mark. For example, capture 'klipfolio' from 'facebook.com/klipfolio?'.
